name: Pixel Ball: 2048
description:
"Pixel Ball: 2048" is a 2048 like puzzle game that merges balls. The bright pixel style is refreshing. The goal of the game is to get the highest score and don't reach the death line. This game makes people relax and relieve pressure. 

The features of this game:

  • Color ball can merge any ball.
  • Magent ball can auto merge the same balls on the desk.

Let's start playing!
